name: Starground
storyline: You take the place of an intergalactic prisoner that was sent to the surface of a planet to exploit its resources for the company.
summary: Starground is a top-down automation and roguelite experience. Enjoy a truly flexible experience. All progression trees are completely independent from each other. Spend all your time automating, dungeoning, or maybe a bit of both. There's no right way to play the game, and any path you take will let you win. If you want to play together, invite your friends to work on the same things, or divide and conquer each part of the game.
